title: Plateno signs its fourth hotel in Sri lankaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Plateno signs its fourth hotel in Sri lanka Published on : Monday, September 14, 2015
Plateno signs its fourth hotel this year in Sri Lanka with Welcome Regency Private Limited. The 102 room resort will be branded as Portofino Ming Gee Resort Passikuda. Portofino Brand is the luxury collection of city hotels, resorts and serviced apartments perfect for guests who are used to luxurious lifestyles and exquisite service and facilities.
Nestled on the centre of the beautiful Pasikuda Bay on an untouched stretch of white sandy beach, the resort has the largest swimming pool in passikuda as well as two restaurant and bars , a spa and fully equipped water sports and dive centre..
Known to have one of the longest stretches of shallow coastline in the world, the coastal community of Passikudah is about 35km Northwest of Batticaloa. The resort is about five hours away from Colombo by road.The resort opens in November 2015 and is the second portofino in sri lanka for plateno.
Source:-Plateno
